alt: Color photo shows a white tower and black lantern attached to a low building with a red roof and surrounded by green grass.
title: Heceta Head Lighthouse, Pacific Ocean, Oregon

alt: Color photo shows a  very tall tower with spiral bands in black and white. The base is red and surrounded by green grass.
title: Cape Hatteras Lighthouse, Outer Banks, North Carolina

alt: Black-and-white photo shows details of the lighting mechanism inside the glass lens.
title: Bodie Island Lighthouse, Outer Banks, North Carolina. Lamp inside the lens

alt: Color photo shows a red-painted square tower at the end of a pier.
title: Holland Harbor Light,  Lake Michigan, Michigan. Also known as Big Red

alt: Black-and-white photo shows a  white-painted tower on the beach. It is leaning over about seven degrees.
title: Cape St. George Light, Gulf of Mexico, Florida

alt: Map with a brown background for both land and water has a red starburst atop a vertical black bar to show lighthouse locations along the Atlantic Ocean coastline. The names of the lighthouses as well as cities, rivers, islands, and  bays, are printed in black.
title: A chart exhibiting the light houses and light vessels on the coast of the United States of America : from Maine to Virginia inclusive, 1848. Geography & Map Division

alt: Map with a brown tone for land and beige for the lakes has red symbols to show lighthouse locations. The names of the lakes, rivers, islands, bays, and channels are printed in black.
title: A chart exhibiting the lighthouses of the lake coast of the United States of America. Great Lakes, 1848. Geography & Map Division

alt: Black-and-white architectural drawing shows two elevations of a tall tower with windows and a black-and-white diamond pattern.
title: Cape Lookout Lighthouse, Outer Banks, North Carolina

alt: Color photo shows from a distance a white tower on a rocky shoreline with red-roof buildings nearby.
title: Portland Head Light, Casco Bay, Maine

alt: Color photo shows a tower with bands of red and white and a black lantern at the top.
title: West Quoddy Head Lighthouse, Lubec, Maine

alt: Black-and-white photo shows a tower with bands of black and white standing behind the keeper's house. A small boy is in the foreground
title: Fire Island Lighthouse, Atlantic Ocean, New York

alt: Color photo shows a  tower with white on the bottom and red on the top, at the shore's edge.
title: Barnegat Lighthouse, Atlantic Ocean, New Jersey

alt: Black-and-white photo shows an octagonal tower with windows standing next to a keeper's house.
title: Lynde Point Lighthouse, Long Island Sound, Connecticut

alt: Color photo shows a short tower, painted white, with houses in the background.
title: Biloxi Light, Gulf of Mexico, Mississippi

alt: Black-and-white architectural drawing shows two vertical sections through the three-story keeper's house that surrounds the tower with a lantern on top.
title: Old Point Loma Lighthouse, San Diego Bay, California

alt: Black-and-white architectural drawing shows the exterior and interior of a tower with seven small plans for comparison to other lighthouses.
title: Minot's Ledge Light, Cohasset Harbor, Massachusetts

alt: Color photo shows a short white tower placed on a rocky point with a covered walkway to the keeper's house.
title: Isles of Shoals Light, Atlantic Ocean, New Hampshire

alt: Black-and-white architectural drawing shows the tower and several details of the entrance door.
title: Erie Land Light,  Lake Erie, Pennsylvania. Also known as Old Presque Isle Light

alt: Color photo shows a white tower with a black lantern, adjacent to a two-story keeper's house. Snow covers the ground.
title: Point Iroquois Lighthouse, Lake Superior, Michigan

alt: Color photo shows, at night, a short white tower above a house at the shoreline.
title: Rose Island Lighthouse, Narragansett Bay, Rhode Island

alt: Black-and-white architectural drawing shows a vertical section through the tower and the two-story keeper's house. The circular staircase is prominent in the tower.
title: Au Sable Light Station, Lake Superior, Michigan

alt: Color photo shows a short, square, white tower above a  large two-story house behind a fence and flower border.
title: Point Fermin Light, San Pedro Bay, California

alt: Color photo looks up the spiral staircase and shows the perforated, red-painted treads.
title: Spiral staircase at Thirty Mile Point Light, Lake Ontario, New York

alt: A brown-toned pair of photos shows a short, pyramid-shaped  lighthouse with windows and a lantern. Buoys in different shapes and sizes are on the ground.
title: Light house and buoys, on display at the International Exhibition, Philadelphia, 1876

alt: Black-and-white photo shows three men in a boat in the foreground with the short, square-tower lighthouse on a reef in the distance.
title: Stepping Stones Light, Long Island Sound, New York

alt: Book illustration shows a skeletal tower on a platform anchored in the water offshore. Includes a keeper's house and a lantern at the top.
title: Fowey Rocks Light, Key Biscayne, Florida

alt: Aerial color photo shows a cylindrical white tower and the keeper's house on a small rocky island
title: Cape Neddick Light, Nubble Island, Maine

alt: Color photo shows a short white tower with black lantern in a harbor setting.
title: Edgartown Harbor Light, Martha's Vineyard, Massachusetts

alt: Color photo shows two towers. The older lighthouse is brick with a green lantern. The newer tower has vertical bands in black and white.
title: Cape Henry lighthouses, Virginia Beach, Virginia

alt: Black-and-white photo shows a spark-plug shaped, short tower with dark and light bands and surrounded by water.
title: Robbins Reef Light, Bayonne, New Jersey

alt: Color photo shows a hexagonal-shaped building on a screw pile surrounded by water with a motor boat underneath.
title: Middle Bay Light,  Mobile Bay, Alabama

alt: Color print shows a full rigged sailing ship moving across ocean waves. The lighthouse is on shore in the background with a schooner on the left and a sloop on the right
title: "Outward Bound," 1886

alt: Color print shows a lighthouse at night with its bright light shining in a stormy sea and a sailing ship in the background.
title: "The Lighthouse by the Sea," Sheet music cover, 1886. Music Division

alt: Black-and-white photo shows a small lighthouse at the base of a suspension bridge tower.
title: Little Red Lighthouse, under the George Washington Bridge, New York City

alt: Black-and-white photo shows a bell with a clapper suspended from a wooden beam with water in the background.
title: Fort Point Light Station, Penobscot Bay, Maine. Fog bell

alt: Color photo shows a skeletal black tower with a central cylinder and a lantern with weather vane. Tall grass is at the base and white painted buildings in the background.
title: Mona Island Light, Puerto Rico

alt: Black-and-white architectural drawing shows the service floor level and the lantern and weather vane at the top of the light.
title: Devils Island Light, Lake Superior, Wisconsin

alt: Color photo shows the white lantern above a red-painted band on a spark plug style lighthouse. Displayed on land.
title: Sabine Bank Light, Gulf of Mexico, Texas. Lantern, on display in a museum park

alt: Color photo shows a pier in the foreground with a red-roofed house and short tower in the background, surrounded on two sides by blue water.
title: The Mukilteo Light, Possession Sound, Washington

alt: Color photo shows a white octagonal tower and mountains in the distance with flat brown turf in the foreground.
title: Moloka'i Light, Hawaii

alt: Color photo shows the glass lens and glass windows in the lantern with two foghorns atop the building below and the blue lake water beyond.
title: Split Rock Lighthouse, Lake Superior, Minnesota. Fresnel lens in lantern

alt: Color photo shows a short, octagonal lighthouse, made of beige bricks with a black lantern, adjacent to a building with two foghorns in the foreground.
title: Split Rock Lighthouse, Lake Superior, Minnesota

alt: Black-and-white photo shows a short, octagonal lighthouse that stands next to another tower with a large steamboat going by and the city across the body of water.
title: "Harbor Entrance and Lights, Buffalo, N.Y."

alt: Color photo shows a white-painted tower with small red-roofed buildings and palm trees nearby and blue ocean water in the distance.
title: Point Vicente Light, Rancho Palos Verdes, California

alt: Black-and-white photo shows in the distance a square tower and lantern located on the mainland and attached to a low building, with water in the foreground.
title: Tree Point Light, Revillagigedo Channel, Alaska

alt: Black-and-white photo shows a man looking closely at the lens of a lighthouse.
title: Frank Schubert polishes the station's lens once a week

alt: Color photo shows a tower with bands of red and white. Several boats are moored in the harbor in front of the tower, which is reflected in the water.
title: Harbour Town Lighthouse, Hilton Head, South Carolina

alt: Color photo shows the top of a  miniature white tower with a blue base and lantern. A green turf putting area is in the foreground.
title: Lighthouse, Lackland Road Putt-Putt miniature golf course, Fort Worth, Texas

alt: Color photo shows a  small white tower with bands of black and white at a miniature golf course.
title: Lighthouse, Mulligan's miniature Golf and Games, Ogden, Utah

alt: Color photo shows a small tower with walls made from stones and a short lantern on top. Stands in a pond of green water.
title: A decorative lighthouse, Falls Park pond, Pendleton, Indiana
